name: DIVINE SHOCK
description:
Purgatory is overwhelmed. A great catastrophe has befallen the mortal realm, and the rising sea of souls grows impatient. Many will evade judgment, many will claw their way back to the living, many will fall by your hammer, as you defend one of many gates to the mortal realm.

Can you carry out your duty, can you prevent Hell on Earth?
  • Wave & timer based arena survival
  • Boss Fights!




For every soul you banish, two shall take their place. They will try to swarm you, pry you from your holy armor, and reduce you to flesh and bone. And given enough time… they will grow strong enough to do so. Before then, the gods grant you their gifts. You shall hold strong. There is no limit to how many gifts you can accumulate, or how powerful you can become. Collect their blessings for as long as you can survive. Trade and tweak their gifts to turn yourself into an unstoppable force.

There is no limit to your power.
  • Enemies grow stronger over time.
  • The longer you survive, the more enemies there are.
  • Infinitely stacking upgrades! Stack yout movement, crit rate, attack speed to infinity and beyond.




Fueled by devotion, within every paladin is a holy power. Channel this power through multiple skills. Juggle your cooldowns, chain and cancel your abilities into one another– express your skills through bursts of damage or mobility.

The only limit is your skill and devotion.
  • 2 skills & 1 ultimate ability
  • Animation cancels & cooldown reset mechanics!
